english: Ta, Seen, Meem
These are the verses of the clear Book

arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Perhaps, [O Muhammad], you would kill yourself with grief that they will not be believers

arabic: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
english: If We willed, We could send down to them from the sky a sign for which their necks would remain humbled

arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ
english: And no revelation comes to them anew from the Most Merciful except that they turn away from it

arabic: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
english: For they have already denied, but there will come to them the news of that which they used to ridicule

arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ
english: Did they not look at the earth - how much We have produced therein from every noble kind

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

arabic: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئۡتِ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
english: And [mention] when your Lord called Moses, [saying], "Go to the wrongdoing people
The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah

arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
english: He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me

arabic: وَيَضِيقُ صَدۡرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَٰرُونَ
english: And that my breast will tighten and my tongue will not be fluent, so send for Aaron

arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ
english: And they have upon me a [claim due to] sin, so I fear that they will kill me

arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ
english: [Allah] said, "No. Go both of you with Our signs; indeed, We are with you, listening

arabic: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds
[Commanded to say], "Send with us the Children of Israel

arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدٗا وَلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
english: [Pharaoh] said, "Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you remained among us for years of your life

arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
english: And [then] you did your deed which you did, and you were of the ungrateful

arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
english: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray

arabic: فَفَرَرۡتُ مِنكُمۡ لَمَّا خِفۡتُكُمۡ فَوَهَبَ لِي رَبِّي حُكۡمٗا وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
english: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and prophethood and appointed me [as one] of the messengers

arabic: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ
english: And is this a favor of which you remind me - that you have enslaved the Children of Israel
Said Pharaoh, "And what is the Lord of the worlds

arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
english: [Moses] said, "The Lord of the heavens and earth and that between them, if you should be convinced
[Pharaoh] said to those around him, "Do you not hear
[Moses] said, "Your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers

arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ
english: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad

arabic: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
english: [Moses] said, "Lord of the east and the west and that between them, if you were to reason

arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ
english: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned
[Moses] said, "Even if I brought you proof manifest

arabic: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
english: [Pharaoh] said, "Then bring it, if you should be of the truthful

arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ
english: So [Moses] threw his staff, and suddenly it was a serpent manifest

arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
english: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white for the observers

arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ
english: [Pharaoh] said to the eminent ones around him, "Indeed, this is a learned magician

arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِۦ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ
english: He wants to drive you out of your land by his magic, so what do you advise

arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبۡعَثۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
english: They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
Who will bring you every learned, skilled magician
So the magicians were assembled for the appointment of a well-known day
And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate

arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
english: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant

arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
english: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant

arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ
english: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]

arabic: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ
english: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw

arabic: فَأَلۡقَوۡاْ حِبَالَهُمۡ وَعِصِيَّهُمۡ وَقَالُواْ بِعِزَّةِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ
english: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant

arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ
english: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified
So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah]
They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds
The Lord of Moses and Aaron

arabic: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحۡرَ فَلَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
english: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all

arabic: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
english: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return

arabic: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers

arabic: ۞وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
english: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued
Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers
[And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band
And indeed, they are enraging us
And indeed, we are a cautious society
So We removed them from gardens and springs
And treasures and honorable station
Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel
So they pursued them at sunrise

arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَـٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ
english: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken

arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ
english: [Moses] said, "No! Indeed, with me is my Lord; He will guide me

arabic: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡقٖ كَٱلطَّوۡدِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
english: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain
And We advanced thereto the pursuers
And We saved Moses and those with him, all together
Then We drowned the others

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
And recite to them the news of Abraham

arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
english: When he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship

arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ
english: They said, "We worship idols and remain to them devoted
He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate
Or do they benefit you, or do they harm

arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ
english: They said, "But we found our fathers doing thus
He said, "Then do you see what you have been worshipping
You and your ancient forefathers

arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: Indeed, they are enemies to me, except the Lord of the worlds
Who created me, and He [it is who] guides me
And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink
And when I am ill, it is He who cures me
And who will cause me to die and then bring me to life

arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لِي خَطِيٓـَٔتِي يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ
english: And who I aspire that He will forgive me my sin on the Day of Recompense

arabic: رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي حُكۡمٗا وَأَلۡحِقۡنِي بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
english: [And he said], "My Lord, grant me authority and join me with the righteous

arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
english: And grant me a reputation of honor among later generations
And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure

arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
english: And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray
And do not disgrace me on the Day they are [all] resurrected

arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٞ وَلَا بَنُونَ
english: The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children

arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلۡبٖ سَلِيمٖ
english: But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart
And Paradise will be brought near [that Day] to the righteous
And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators

arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ
english: And it will be said to them, "Where are those you used to worship

arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ
english: Other than Allah? Can they help you or help themselves
So they will be overturned into Hellfire, they and the deviators
And the soldiers of Iblees, all together
They will say while they dispute therein

arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
english: By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
When we equated you with the Lord of the worlds
And no one misguided us except the criminals
So now we have no intercessors
And not a devoted friend

arabic: فَلَوۡ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةٗ فَنَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Then if we only had a return [to the world] and could be of the believers

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
The people of Noah denied the messengers

arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
english: When their brother Noah said to them, "Will you not fear Allah
Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger
So fear Allah and obey me

arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds
So fear Allah and obey me
They said, "Should we believe you while you are followed by the lowest [class of people]

arabic: قَالَ وَمَا عِلۡمِي بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
english: He said, "And what is my knowledge of what they used to do

arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ
english: Their account is only upon my Lord, if you [could] perceive
And I am not one to drive away the believers
I am only a clear warner

arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ
english: They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned
He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me

arabic: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers

arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
english: So We saved him and those with him in the laden ship
Then We drowned thereafter the remaining ones

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
Aad denied the messengers

arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
english: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah
Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger
So fear Allah and obey me

arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds
Do you construct on every elevation a sign, amusing yourselves
And take for yourselves palaces and fortresses that you might abide eternally
And when you strike, you strike as tyrants
So fear Allah and obey me
And fear He who provided you with that which you know
Provided you with grazing livestock and children
And gardens and springs

arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
english: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day

arabic: قَالُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوَعَظۡتَ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡوَٰعِظِينَ
english: They said, "It is all the same to us whether you advise or are not of the advisors
This is not but the custom of the former peoples
And we are not to be punished

arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: And they denied him, so We destroyed them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
Thamud denied the messengers

arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
english: When their brother Salih said to them, "Will you not fear Allah
Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger
So fear Allah and obey me

arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds
Will you be left in what is here, secure [from death]
Within gardens and springs
And fields of crops and palm trees with softened fruit
And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill
So fear Allah and obey me
And do not obey the order of the transgressors

arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
english: Who cause corruption in the land and do not amend
They said, "You are only of those affected by magic

arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا فَأۡتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
english: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful

arabic: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
english: He said, "This is a she-camel. For her is a [time of] drink, and for you is a [time of] drink, [each] on a known day

arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
english: And do not touch her with harm, lest you be seized by the punishment of a terrible day
But they hamstrung her and so became regretful

arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
The people of Lot denied the messengers

arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
english: When their brother Lot said to them, "Will you not fear Allah
Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger
So fear Allah and obey me

arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds
Do you approach males among the worlds

arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٌ عَادُونَ
english: And leave what your Lord has created for you as mates? But you are a people transgressing

arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ
english: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted
He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it]
My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do
So We saved him and his family, all
Except an old woman among those who remained behind
Then We destroyed the others

arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ
english: And We rained upon them a rain [of stones], and evil was the rain of those who were warned

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
The companions of the thicket denied the messengers

arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
english: When Shu'ayb said to them, "Will you not fear Allah
Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger
So fear Allah and obey me

arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
english: And I do not ask you for it any payment. My payment is only from the Lord of the worlds
Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss
And weigh with an even balance

arabic: وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ
english: And do not deprive people of their due and do not commit abuse on earth, spreading corruption
And fear He who created you and the former creation
They said, "You are only of those affected by magic

arabic: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
english: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars

arabic: فَأَسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
english: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful
He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do

arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ
english: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day

arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
english: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers
And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds
The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down
Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners
In a clear Arabic language
And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples

arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَـٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ
english: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel
And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners

arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it
Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals

arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ
english: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment
And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not
And they will say, "May we be reprieved
So for Our punishment are they impatient
Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years
And then there came to them that which they were promised

arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يُمَتَّعُونَ
english: They would not be availed by the enjoyment with which they were provided

arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
english: And We did not destroy any city except that it had warners
As a reminder; and never have We been unjust
And the devils have not brought the revelation down
It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able
Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed

arabic: فَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُعَذَّبِينَ
english: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished
And warn, [O Muhammad], your closest kindred

arabic: وَٱخۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
english: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers

arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
english: And if they disobey you, then say, "Indeed, I am disassociated from what you are doing
And rely upon the Exalted in Might, the Merciful
Who sees you when you arise
And your movement among those who prostrate
Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing

arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
english: Shall I inform you upon whom the devils descend
They descend upon every sinful liar
They pass on what is heard, and most of them are liars
And the poets - [only] the deviators follow them

arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي كُلِّ وَادٖ يَهِيمُونَ
english: Do you not see that in every valley they roam
And that they say what they do not do

arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَذَكَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا وَٱنتَصَرُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا ظُلِمُواْۗ وَسَيَعۡلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَيَّ مُنقَلَبٖ يَنقَلِبُونَ
english: Except those [poets] who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah often and defend [the Muslims] after they were wronged. And those who have wronged are going to know to what [kind of] return they will be returned
